entry.title: Derick's Story
entry.description:
75% liver removed
 5 lymph nodes( two were positive for FHC), 
 gallbladder removed 
 bile duct reconstruction 
 Metastasis in arm 
 stage 4 
 radiation treatment for arm : few minutes a day, 5 days a week, for 2 weeks
